description: These nutty oat muffins are one of the quickest and easiest bakes to have on hand for busy weeks.
name: Peanut Butter & Banana Oat Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop the batter into the muffin cases and bake for 5 minutes, then reduce the heat to 170°C/150°C fan-forced and bake for 15 minutes until lightly golden. Cool for 10 minutes on a wire rack and serve.
